text: Anyone had issues with mixItUp.js not working on the live site but works in the design manager preview area?

Hi all, my name is Julie, I'm a Senior UX Researcher working with the Content Tools teams here at HubSpot. We're starting to explore local CMS development workflows and I was hoping you all could give me a couple minutes of your time and fill out this quick survey, <https://www.research.net/r/22LXYN2>. We'd love to know more about some of your processes to make sure we're creating tools that are useful to you. Thanks so much!
Has anyone had an issue with Google Analytics stop pulling in the data all of a sudden. Its happening on a few of our sites
<!here>, We need your help! If you have a couple minutes and are interested in helping the HubSpot CMS Product team build better tools for CMS developers please fill out the above survey. Thanks!

Welcome, everyone new! So glad to see this group grow to over 400 developers now :chart_with_upwards_trend:. We want to continue to see this group grow -- so if you know developers from other agencies, or just independent developers who are building on HubSpot, send them here: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/slack>. I monitor that form and will invite anyone who fills it out.
